description: This file provides centralized configuration helpers for the frontend application, including functions to retrieve environment-based configs such as API base URL, frontend URL, and WebSocket URL. It also defines convenience functions to access specific config values.

methods.name: getFrontendConfig()
methods.description: Returns runtime-safe config values read at build time, defaulting to a specified URL if environment variables are not set.

methods.name: getApiBase()
methods.description: Convenience function to get the API base URL from configuration.

methods.name: getAppUrl()
methods.description: Provides the frontend URL used in redirects, falling back to window location origin if needed.
